subject: Football
Coaches and Managers
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Austin played for the 1956 N.F.L. champion Giants, coached the Green Bay Packers’ offensive linemen for Vince Lombardi’s power sweep and was twice an N.F.L. head coach.
snippet: Mr. Austin played for the 1956 N.F.L. champion Giants, coached the Green Bay Packers’ offensive linemen for Vince Lombardi’s power sweep and was twice an N.F.L. head coach.
